d:
A while ago, I came across this miniseries on Danbooru, translated into English by LightSolas, and I translated it to spanish for my "personal use"; then I found this higher-quality version and thought it was worth sharing.

My thanks to LightSolas and to everyone who translates Japanese illustrations on Danbooru and similar websites. Without them, we wouldn't know what the hell is going on in certain drawings...

EDIT: I have made a couple of changes, at the suggestion of my friend Gaea.

Original:
https://e-hentai.org/g/3750979/87a1488887/

Spanish translation:
https://e-hentai.org/g/3750977/81981d2e38/
